entry.content:
Hi! I am currently a computer-engineering undergraduate student at Delhi Technological University. This is my academic website :)

 

A list of projects I have worked on:

AIDDT At AIDDT I am building artificial intelligence software to help design drugs. Recently, I have used AIDDT to help generate over 19000 drug candidates which are potentially effective against the COVID-19. I have submitted a few of the most potent (predicted)
